cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 9th Nov 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 9th Nov 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Deluxe 12 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Bunk Inn Hostels Brand New addition Bunk Inn 2. Brand new facility to be completed October 2018. 12 Bed Fully Bespoke Capsule Bedding system custom built by German Designer. Air Conditioning, Free Wifi, Free Laundry, Netflix, and all linen included free!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
